direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add HTML content to elements but at different positions (end vs. start).
Both methods set HTML content for elements, but append adds to the existing content.
Both methods manipulate the HTML structure of elements, though wrap surrounds the element.
Both methods involve modifying elements and handle potential exceptions similarly.
Both methods change the state of elements, though select filters elements.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing elements is necessary before appending HTML content.
Environment setup is required before manipulating elements.
Verifying HTML content helps ensure the append operation was successful.
